name: Skyworld: Wind Corsair
description:
Skyworld: Wind Corsair

Skyworld: Wind Corsair is a 2D Side-scroller adventure game set in the floating islands world called ‘Skyworld’. Take on the role of the captain of a skyship as you fly through vivid environments fighting enemies and collecting treasure with which you can upgrade your ship as you progress towards fighting the ultimate pirate boss.

 

Features:

  • -Fly around in a skyship
  • -Explore wonderful environments
  • -Fight multiple different types of enemy ships
  • -Collect coins to upgrade your ship with better weapons, more health and speed!
  • -Progress through the levels to challenge the boss of the wind corsairs.

 

Music by Dexter Britain - https://dexterbritain.com/music/

Licensed under Creative Commons

Songs used:

  • The Time to Run (Finale)
  • Pollution

Install instructions

Download the zip file and extract it. Then run - SkyworldWindCorsair.exe

On Windows 10, a "Windows protected your PC" message may pop up. If so, just click "More info" and "Run anyway".

Recommended Resolution: 1920x1080

This is a finished game, but it is just the beginning of the stories to be told in Skyworld. There are also many plans for future additions to Wind Corsair including new environments, new ships, a quest/job system with different objectives, and possibly even a whole new gameplay loop allowing you to get out of your ship and roam around as your skyship captain character.

If you are interested, feel free to follow and comment and all that stuff.

Otherwise, I hope you enjoy this fun little game of mine!
